name: Iron Man Pinball
summary: Iron Man Pinball brings you action and adventure in the Super Hero Marvel style. Iron Man Pinball is a full-sized arcade pinball machine that provides non-stop action for pinball players of all ages and skill levels. Join billionaire industrialist Tony Stark, played by Robert Downey Jr., as Iron Man, the metallic super hero, on a thrilling action-packed adventure as he battles his enemies.
